## Plot of fuel consumption

```{r, message=FALSE}
ggplot(mpg,aes(x=displ,y=cty,fill=drv,colour=drv))+
  geom_point(stat="identity",position="identity")+
  geom_smooth(size=1)+scale_color_hue("Drive:", breaks=c(1,2,3),labels=c("4wd","front","rear"))
```
